article_title: Health Care for Illegals Paid by the Taxpayers
article_text: The architects of the Affordable Care Act knew that when they put a prohibition in the bill to provide government-sponsored health care to unauthorized immigrants that federal laws would mandate their care in emergency rooms or federally qualified health centers (“Despite Federal Health Law, Illegal Immigrants Get Care,” page one, March 25). This is basically a hidden tax on all Americans who purchase their health care. We studied which congressional districts have the most unauthorized immigrants and Medicaid enrollees receiving care. As ACA dramatically decreases “disproportionate share hospital” funding in fiscal...

article_summary:
The architects of the Affordable Care Act knew that when they put a prohibition in the bill to provide government-sponsored health care to unauthorized immigrants that federal laws would mandate their care in emergency rooms or federally qualified health centers (“Despite Federal Health Law, Illegal Immigrants Get Care,” page one, March 25).
This is basically a hidden tax on all Americans who purchase their health care.
We studied which congressional districts have the most unauthorized immigrants and Medicaid enrollees receiving care.
As ACA dramatically decreases “disproportionate share hospital” funding in fiscal...
